Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the wealth of the Koch brothers by stating that they are the richest people in the world when they are actually tied for sixth place on the international list.
Understate: The claim understates the wealth of the Koch brothers by stating that individually they are only fifth when they are actually tied for sixth place.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the Koch brothers are the richest people in the world, as it does not provide any evidence or sources.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the existence of the Walton family, who collectively have a greater net worth than the Koch brothers.
